comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of bowls of salmon
- y: number of bowls of eggs

Definitions:
- x: number of bowls of salmon consumed by the fitness guru
- y: number of bowls of eggs consumed by the fitness guru

Constraints:
- Calories: 300x + 200y \geq 2000
- Protein: 15x + 8y \geq 90
- Eggs Limit: y \leq 0.4(x)
- Sodium: 80x + 20y \leq S

Objective:
- Minimize S (sodium intake)
